Hacking a Data Science Program

21 Aug 2017

However, after watching Tetiana Ivanovaâ€™s speech during the PyData London 2016 I realized that maybe I can pursue a similar path by hacking into self-directed learning. Now I am on my quest on how to hack a data science program.

I will update this as soon I get relevant sources of a personalized data science program.
